item.title: How do I Remove Member needs?
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

[quote=“Hockey4lifexx, post:2, topic:179338”]search for public int GetCLMembers in client.java

under it u SHOULD see something like:

if (ItemID == 6918) { return 1; }

erase all those and then everyone including nonmembers will be able to wear anything.

u can alos just make urself member by going into ur data folder and changing ur character rights to 1 instead fo 0.[/quote]

Lol I edit mine by opening up a notepad named members inside data and i add peoples names and they become members =)

item.title: How do I Remove Member needs?
item.dc:creator: @valiken valiken
item.description:
@valiken wrote:

I found all of these… What do I delete?

} return 1; } public int GetCLMembers(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 0; } //String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); //enable this if you would like to make items members using their name. if (ItemID == 6918) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 6916) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 6924) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 14915) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 6920) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 6922) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 6585) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 4214) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 1040) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 1042) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 1044) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 1046) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 1048) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 6528) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 7158) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 1149) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 3140) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 4087) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 4585) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 1187) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11281) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11298) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11981) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11977) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11978) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11979) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11824) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11153) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11154) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11155) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11490) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11444) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11371) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11372) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11168) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11169) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 11170) { return 1; } return 0; } public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 10713) { return 100; } if (ItemID == 11154) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 11155) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 859) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 861) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 1135) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 1099) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 1065) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 2501) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 2495) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 2577) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 2581) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 10431) { return 65; } if (ItemID == 2489) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 11153) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 15156) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 10713) { return 100; } if (ItemID == 10715) { return 100; } if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Karil")) { return 70; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Range Cape")) { return 100; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Dark Bow")) { return 100; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Crystal")) { return 80; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Seercull")) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 2497) { return 70; } return 1; }
